DOC.brief_summary: Prevalence participant protective immunity measles virus less ninety percent . Predictor adequate measles antibody level include follow : - History measles infection - History complete measles primary immunization ( 2 dos least 1 month interval age 9 month ) - History measles exposure Predictor inadequate measles antibody level include follow : - Born outside Thailand - History stay outside Thailand long time childhood - Living rural area long period childhood - Fail participate school system time
DOC.brief_title: Immunity Measles Virus Thai Population Age 18-30 Years Predictive Factors
DOC.criteria: Age 1830 year old Last measles vaccination le 10 year age Immunocompromised host include congenital immune defect , splenectomy splenic dysfunction , history suspect HIV exposure , take immunosuppressant Receiving blood blood product within 3 month Receiving others vaccination immunoglobulin medication possibly decrease immune response
